Press and hold the RED button on Alpha’s head (see previous figure). \n Then, release the button. The indicator will flash and \n Alpha will announce, “Sonar has started.”
Keep Alpha and the mobile phone within 1m of each other
The WiFi password cannot be blank.
The WiFi name cannot be blank.
Check if the WiFi name is correct.
Please connect to the same WiFi network as on your mobile phone. Also, make sure the name and password are correct.
The password must contain at least 8 characters.
You have not set your personal hotspot.
Please choose “Settings >Portale WLANL hostpot” to start your hotspot.
Your hotspot will be shown after it is started. Remember its name and password.

1. Please check if the Wi-Fi information you have entered is correct 
2. Please make sure your mobile phone is within 1 meter from the Alpha 
3. Please ensure you have enabled the Network Monitoring on Alpha 
4. Network connection timeout

1. Please check if the Wi-Fi information you entered is correct 
2. Please make sure your mobile phone is within 1 meter from the Alpha 
3. Please ensure you have enabled the Sound Wave on Alpha 
4. Network connection timeout
The qr code will be generated
Keep the QR code within 20cm-40cm of the robot\'s camera until heard the tone
1.Keep the QR code within 20cm-40cm of the robot\'s camera until heard the tone
Distance and angle are related to the success rate of scanning
the light is too dark,robot can\'t scan the QR code
You can do other things ,during the process
Can not use the sweep function, please turn on the camera to set the relevant permissions
Failed to generate QR code. Please try again
1. Please make sure the WiFi name and password are correct.
3. Please confirm that your mobile phone is not muted and that the volume is turned up.
4. When connecting to the network, make sure your mobile phone is close to the robot (Fig. 1).
5. After sending the network information, press the button located on the robot\'s head as indicated on the picture below (Fig. 2).
Press and hold the button of the robot as shown in the figure until you hear the tone, which indicates the start of the monitoring function.
6. After doing so, please send the network infromation within 20 seconds.
Are you unable to connect to a network?
Unable to connect to the network?
* If the problem persists, contact us at:
If 20 seconds have passed, repeat step 5
If Alpha answers \"whats up\" when you say "hello Alpha" to it.
That means the robot is awakened.
Please keep your ambient environment quiet when saying \"connect to wifi\".
If Alpha cannot be waken up or low battery，please recharge Alpha
If you still can\'t heard alpha\'s response，you can try this
After wake Alpha up，long press the light which in front of its head
Until Alpha say \"start to connect wifi\"
While the robot is on,\n press and hold the location on its head as shown in the figure until a tone is heard.
* keep the robot within 1 meter from your mobile device
* to raise the volume of your phone, move your phone close to the robot

XX has canceled the authorization given to you. You won\'t be able to connect to his Alpha 2 anymore.
XX invites you to use his/her Alpha 2. You will get permission to use his/her Alpha 2 after accepting the inviation. You can also unbind the robot on the its main page.
